content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper plate factory
No copper plate factory exists

### Iron plate factory
Consists of 
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
- Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
and connected chests

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and connected chests

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when trying to research without ingredients
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to research

### Errors when trying to smelt without ingredients
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in the furnace before attempting to smelt

### Errors when burner mining drills or furnaces are out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your inventory to supply the burner mining drills and furnaces

### Errors when steam engine is not connected to a fluid system
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it

### Errors when offshore pump is out of fuel
- Ensure you have enough fuel in your inventory to supply the offshore pump

### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Ensure the pipe group is connected to a fluid system and has enough fluid before attempting to use it
